physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 5 x 7 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on envelope: "#696 Rose Platt Hoffman, circa 1913." Handwritten on back of photograph: "Rose Platt Hoffman, ca. 1913, Cigar rolling factory, 2nd from left 2nd row (w. glasses), #696."

mods.abstract: Rose Platt Hoffman seated in a group of unidentified women on the steps of Zion Baptist Church, located at 20th and Arapahoe in Denver, Colorado. Rose is in the second row, second from left, wearing glasses. The women worked at a cigar rolling factory.
